name: Chihiro's Grand Adventure: The Story Begins (Playable Demo)
name_original: Chihiro's Grand Adventure: The Story Begins (Playable Demo)
description:
"Join Chihiro and her friends as they travel the world in search of new adventures and experiences. Complete with a Weapon and Item Crafting System, which are fueled by Farming and Mining Systems, and Side Quests to get a look into the backstory of various story characters and get extra rare weapons and items as rewards!"

This demo allows you to try out our game and get a feel for what we have to offer. Have any suggestions for making our games even better? Then leave a comment below telling us what you think and we'll try to work some of your ideas into our future games!

Like our games and want to support our future games? Then why not become one of our patrons on our Patreon page! Our games are 100% self-funding so any support is much appreciated and will allow us to commission artists for our future games.

A full catalog of our games can be found at the official KuroyukiDev Games website.
